name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TrackerJam - Automatic Time Tracker and Web Analytics

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic browser web time tracker. Track time and get full detailed information about the websites visited.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your own or your team's work time to understand browser usage habits and achieve peak performance. Get detailed analytics on the use of websites. 
Tracks time, domains, productivity and more

TrackerJam analyzes your team's web browser activity, providing detailed insights into core time metrics and essential productivity reports.

TrackerJam is a combination of a Chrome extension to analyze activity and a Web app to see the insights.

Features:
✅ Get full detailed information about the websites visited
✅ Automatic start and stop of the tracker according to your settings
✅ Compare the statistics of working hours by day
✅ Track time and get the complete picture of your work day with zero effort
✅ Settings of working hours and working hours for each day
✅ Track time on specified websites or exclude any websites
